channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- Secure Content Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- Secure Content Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-1973|2024-03-25T21:27:43.774Z -- OpenText -- Secure Content Manager
item.description: By leveraging the vulnerability, lower-privileged users of Content Manager can manipulate Content Manager clients to elevate privileges and perform unauthorized operations.
